eg

Class Prefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.Prefs

  • public class Prefs
extends java.lang.Object
    The reading from and writing to the Prefs file in the program folder and a ProjectConfig file in a project folder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PROJ_CONFIG_FILE
      The name of the ProjConfig file that may be stored in a project

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Prefs()
      Creates a Prefs that reads from and writes to the Prefs file in the program folder.
      Prefs(java.lang.String projectDir)
      Creates a Prefs that reads from and writes to a ProjConfig file in the specified project directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the value of the property that corresponds to the specified key
      void load()
      Loads the properties from file
      void setProperty(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Sets a new value for the property that corresponds to the the specified key.
      void store()
      Writes the properties to file

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • PROJ_CONFIG_FILE

        public static final java.lang.String PROJ_CONFIG_FILE
        The name of the ProjConfig file that may be stored in a project
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Prefs

        public Prefs()
        Creates a Prefs that reads from and writes to the Prefs file in the program folder. Every new Prefs object accesses the same set of properties. The properties are not loaded from the Prefs file.

      • Prefs

        public Prefs(java.lang.String projectDir)
        Creates a Prefs that reads from and writes to a ProjConfig file in the specified project directory. The properties are loaded if the file exists. Every new Prefs object accesses an own set of properties.
        Parameters:
        projectDir - the directory

    • Method Detail

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(java.lang.String key,
                        java.lang.String value)
        Sets a new value for the property that corresponds to the the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - the property key
        value - the new value

      • getProperty

        public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the value of the property that corresponds to the specified key
        Parameters:
        key - the property key
        Returns:
        the value or the empty string if the property coud not be found

      • load

        public void load()
        Loads the properties from file

      • store

        public void store()
        Writes the properties to file
